headline: Sikles Hydropower Limited has issued a notice to the promoter shareholders, Local residents, employees, investors, concerned regulatory bodies and all other stakeholders regarding the expiration of the lock-in period of 73,84,500.00 units share on 10th of Ashwin, 2082

85,00,000.00 Units of IPO Shares has been listed in NEPSE. The Open Price Range is set as Rs.116.86 to Rs.350.58 for the First Transactions - Sikles Hydropower Limited (SIKLES)
Sikles Hydropower Limited has appointed B.O.K. Capital Market Limited as its share registrar.
Sikles Hydropower Limited has distributed its 11,50,000.00 units of IPO shares to the general public on Ashwin 11, 2079
Sikles Hydropower Limited is going to close its 11,50,000.00 units of IPO shares to the general public from today, Ashwin 02, 2079
Sikles Hydropower Limited is going to open its 11,50,000.00 units of IPO shares to the general public starting from today, Bhadra 29, 2079
Sikles Hydropower Limited is going to issue its 11,50,000.00 units of IPO shares to the general public starting from 29th Bhadra - 2nd Ashwin, 2079

Sikles Hydropower Limited has distributed its 8,50,000.00 units of IPO shares to the project affected local residents of Kaski District, Madi VDC Ward No. 1, 2 & 3 on Bhadra 15, 2079 and is going to refund the payment to the non-allottee's bank account starting from Bhadra 20, 2079
Sikles Hydropower Limited is going to close its 8,50,000.00 units of IPO shares to the project affected local residents of Kaski District, Madi VDC Ward No. 1, 2 & 3 from today, Bhadra 05, 2079
Sikles Hydropower Limited has extended its 8,50,000.00 units of IPO shares to the project affected local residents of Kaski District, Madi VDC Ward No. 1, 2 & 3 till Bhadra 05, 2079

Sikles Hydropower Limited is going to open its 8,50,000.00 units of IPO shares to the project affected local residents of Kaski District, Madi VDC Ward No. 1, 2 & 3 starting from today, Shrawan 06, 2079

Sikles Hydropower Limited is going to issue its 8,50,000.00 units of IPO shares to the project affected local residents of Kaski District, Madi VDC Ward No. 1, 2 & 3 starting from 6th - 20th Shrawan, 2079
Sikles Hydropower Limited has proclaimed its 17th AGM going to be held on Jestha 13, 2079
